# Ali Imam

> Hi, I'm Ali Imam, I love design and code, I'm currently building a free, open-source design library for everyone.

This file provides LLM-friendly entry points to documentation and examples.

## Components

- [accordion](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/accordion): The accordion component.
- [alert](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/alert): The alert component.
- [alert-dialog](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/alert-dialog): The alert-dialog component.
- [aspect-ratio](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/aspect-ratio): The aspect-ratio component.
- [avatar](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/avatar): The avatar component.
- [badge](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/badge): The badge component.
- [breadcrumb](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/breadcrumb): The breadcrumb component.
- [button](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/button): The button component.
- [calendar](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/calendar): The calendar component.
- [card](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/card): The card component.
- [carousel](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/carousel): The carousel component.
- [chart](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/chart): The chart component.
- [checkbox](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/checkbox): The checkbox component.
- [collapsible](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/collapsible): The collapsible component.
- [command](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/command): The command component.
- [dialog](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/dialog): The dialog component.
- [drawer](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/drawer): The drawer component.
- [dropdown-menu](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/dropdown-menu): The dropdown-menu component.
- [input](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/input): The input component.
- [label](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/label): The label component.
- [navigation-menu](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/navigation-menu): The navigation-menu component.
- [pagination](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/pagination): The pagination component.
- [popover](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/popover): The popover component.
- [progress](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/progress): The progress component.
- [radio-group](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/radio-group): The radio-group component.
- [scroll-area](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/scroll-area): The scroll-area component.
- [select](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/select): The select component.
- [separator](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/separator): The separator component.
- [sheet](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/sheet): The sheet component.
- [sidebar](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/sidebar): The sidebar component.
- [skeleton](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/skeleton): The skeleton component.
- [slider](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/slider): The slider component.
- [sonner](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/sonner): The sonner component.
- [switch](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/switch): The switch component.
- [table](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/table): The table component.
- [tabs](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/tabs): The tabs component.
- [textarea](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/textarea): The textarea component.
- [toggle](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/toggle): The toggle component.
- [toggle-group](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/toggle-group): The toggle-group component.
- [tooltip](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/tooltip): The tooltip component.
